newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan gets three bids for RBD palm oil.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan gets three bids for RBD palm oil.

text.p: The state-run Trading Corp of Pakistan (TCP) received three bids on Tuesday in response to its tender for 9,000 tonnes of RBD palm oil, dealers said.

Pan Century offered a rate of $505.40 per tonne FOB and Felda $508 per tonne FOB for 9,000 tonnes of palm oil in the first half of November. Cargill offered $511.88 for 3,000 tonnes of palm oil for shipment by November 20, one dealer said.
The TCP was expected to announce a decision later on Tuesday, the dealer said.
